title: datalad get (and git-annex get) report "ok" on windows but the file is still a git link
body:
@mvdm , encouraged by the success of @manimoh (with rclone special remote and dropbox), ventured into the land of trying DataLad on Windows. 

This is in the dataset from http://datasets.datalad.org/?dir=/labs/mvdm/BiconditionalOdor , you can see that upon `get` the file is still a git link

```shell
(py37) PS C:\Users\mvdm\BiconditionalOdor\M040-2020-04-28-CDOD11> datalad get .\M040-2020-04-28-4.2mm-L6-pre_17minsin.png
get(ok): M040-2020-04-28-CDOD11\M040-2020-04-28-4.2mm-L6-pre_17minsin.png (file) [from origin...]
(py37) PS C:\Users\mvdm\BiconditionalOdor\M040-2020-04-28-CDOD11> cat .\M040-2020-04-28-4.2mm-L6-pre_17minsin.png
/annex/objects/MD5E-s846290--cb1db09d32f84c87fde6accfaf5f415e.png
```

<details>
<summary>DataLad WTF</summary>

Surprising fact that it worked ok for @manimoh
